column1: nice start, squares him up with some seam movement, back of a length and think that came off the back leg. Actually, was an outside edge
good length outside off, left alone
in the channel outside off, 133kph, Stoinis happy to leave another one alone
bang! Full outside off, good stride forward and a crunching cover drive
dragged down short, pulled well in front of square but not quite out of the middle...well away from deep square
full outside off, very sweetly driven but straight to mid-off
comes down the pitch first, makes it into a full toss and gets a thick edge into his boot
short of a length outside off, driven to cover
quick to come out of his crease again, gets the ball on the full, played down to long-on
full at off stump, pushed gently to long-off
tossed up full and straight, driven to cover
touch shorter outside off, but Cartwright picks out cover as he drives off the back foot
back of a length at off stump, excellent line, defended to cover
touch shorter, Stoinis plays back and defends to the on side...always happy to give himself time
full at off stump, 124kph, driven without much timing to cover
on the pads but he gets away with it as Stoinis flicks straight to short fine leg
all the way! A short delivery on leg stump, Stoinis helps it on the way with a pull up and over fine leg
full outside off, driven to cover and scampers the single
terrific shot, that's his power! Short, but not that short, Stoinis rocks back and pulls over deep midwicket
driven to long-off
comes forward and drives to cover
just through the gap! Driven in the air but right in the middle of cover and extra cover
full at off stump, a hefty swing down the ground to long-on
eases onto the front foot and pushes down the ground
over the wicket, short of a length outside off, cracked off the back foot to mid-off
good fielding at cover! Stoinis struck this very hard off the back foot
a lovely pick-up shot...short of a length, goes on one leg and pulls behind square
back of a length at off stump, no width on offer, driven to cover
that's very well played, back cuts at just a hint of width as the ball angles across him, sends it through backward point
another one pulled off the hip, and again with the placement, short of a length and Stoinis sends it to deep backward square. He's looking very good
excellent stroke, gets through backward point...short of a length outside off, gets on top of the bounce and square drives, but that should have been cut off
fuller, angled into the pads, worked into midwicket
full, pushed well down the leg side
that's a cracker! Extra lift from short of a length outside off, beats Stoinis who is taken by surprise
another crisp pull but this time he finds deep midwicket
short at the body, a back-of-the-hand slower ball, goes for the pull but it comes off his glove towards short fine leg
angled into the pads, heaved to deep square leg
length ball, pushed into the on side
back of a length outside off, punched square through point off the back foot
gives himself room and swings a back-of-a-length delivery into the pitch and it bounces back towards the bowler
full outside off, driven to deep cover
back of a length, straight, played to the on side
fuller, at the stumps, defended to the leg side...very good over
comes down the pitch and drives a low full toss to long-on
dragged down short outside leg stump, poor ball, easily put away as Stoinis pulls it wide of short fine leg
fuller, on the pads, tucked into midwicket and weighted perfectly to allow the second to the edge of the circle
pushed down the side, glances the pad towards fine leg...Pope hasn't got his line right yet
top shot! Full, wide outside off, strides forward and throws his hands into a strong cover drive
short of a length outside off, driven to cover
round the wicket, full at the stumps, pushed to the bowler
outside off, full, opens the face and places it through backward point
short outside off, square cut to deep point
wide outside off, left alone...wanted the wide call
great shot! Came down the pitch, he had to reach for it a little as it was outside off, connected perfectly and sent it straight down the ground
pushed up fuller, he stays in his crease and drives to long-off
drives to point
dragged down short on leg stump, only costs a single as he pulls to deeps square
very full and very wide outside off, driven to cover
thumped! Phew, some power in that. He just stands in the crease and belts through the line of a full delivery, sends it racing to long-on
comes forward and drives to deep cover to bring up a superb 36-ball fifty
slips another down the leg side, neat glovework but it's a wide
full at off stump, driven to cover where it's well stopped by Henriques
round the wicket, short of a length outside off, cracked firmly off the back foot to cover
heaved through midwicket! Short of a length, Stoinis onto the pull again, not quite out of the middle but well enough
that's a superb stroke, drives a back-of-a-length delivery wide of deep cover
a slower ball, short of a length, Stoinis waits a little on the shot then laps it to deep square
good length outside off, square drives to deep point, a comfortable two to the long boundary
short of a length at off stump, pulled to long-on, think he was aiming squarer than that
lovely stroke! Short of a length, Stoinis helps it around the corner, well wide of deep square
banged in very short, 121kph, a tennis forehand down the ground to long-on
that's gone VERY high...and VERY long! Full at leg stump, Cartwright gives himself a touch of room and launches it straight down the ground
excellent yorker, appeal for lbw! Not out, deflects off the boot to the leg side
back of a length on the pads, slower ball at 109kph, worked to short fine leg
a short ball on off stump, loops through to the keeper and the umpires rule that's okay for height
short, pulled to deep square leg...would have wanted more than a single for that
worked off the pads with a straight bat to deep midwicket
back of a length at off stump, tight run and a better throw from Hughes would have had Cartwright in trouble at the keeper's end
outside off, square drives to deep cover...good effort from Pope
full outside off, driven into the covers
driven through the covers, wide of long-off
back of a length at off stump, played with an open face to point
gives himself room to leg, gets an inside edge into the pads which goes wide of the keeper
a short ball over leg stump, he's through the shot early but it's called wide
short of a length, straight, pulled to deep square
full outside off, has a huge swing and it skews off a thick edge over third man
straight down the ground...the way! Who needs Maxwell?! Full at off stump, lofted over long-on as he picks the slower ball
back of a length, straight, an appeal for lbw as Cartwright plays across the line but it's angling down
big full toss, called no-ball, and hooked for six! On the hip, Stoinis does well to hold his shape, sends it over fine leg
fantastic stroke, it's a wide yorker, he slices his drive through backward point...terrific placement
a straight low full toss, heaved through midwicket off the toe end
what a shot! That's a beauty...he is playing a blinder. Full at off stump, a mighty swing through the line straight down the ground into the sightscreen
back of a length at off stump, another slower ball, cut through point wide of the sweeper

another low full toss at the stumps, does this make the boundary at deep midwicket? That will be a brilliant save by Silk if he's kept this in. This is tight, is Silk in contact with ball and rope? Given four. Ouch
full outside off, a slower ball, dabbed to short third man so he keeps the strike...26 off the over
round the wicket, full and straight, driven to deep cover and does well to make it into the second...he's on 99
full at the stumps, blocked!
there it is! A first T20 hundred for Stoinis. Driven into the covers. It's been a superb innings
crunched, immense power! Quite short outside off, Cartwright charges and just hammers it straight down the ground. Great shot
low full toss driven firmly to long-off...and that's his fifty off 36 balls
drives down the ground to long-off
round the wicket, very wide outside off, driven wide of the sweeper who makes good ground
oh, brilliant! Moves across the crease and scoops this off the stumps to fine leg
length ball outside off, hammered to long-off
full, wide outside off, Stoinis tries to repeat Cartwright's scoop but misses and it takes the pads
that almost doesn't land on the pitch outside off...it's a wide
length ball outside off, a slower one, clubbed out to deep midwicket
wide of long-off...full, wide outside off, a cracking shot from Cartwright as he picks the gap. That equals the highest opening stand in BBL
length ball outside off, Stoinis falls over as he tries to scoop over the keeper
a slower ball, banged into the pitch, sent to cover
gets away with it, a one-handed swing over cover and falls between two fielders. Highest stand in BBL history
a full toss outside off, slips off his feet but manages to skew it over backward point
a short ball, he follows him, but Stoinis upper cuts over point...they can't stop him
short of a length, swung down to long-on
in the stands again! Brilliant batting. Over the wicket, short of a length, he moves across to off stump and pulls it miles back over long leg
and again! A big full toss outside off, Stoinis helps it over short fine leg to reach the highest ever individual score in BBL history. Stoinis acknowledges the crowd
oh, that's magnificent! It just keeps getting better from Stoinis. Picks this up from outside off and flicks it over deep square off the front foot
full, pushed across outside off, Stoinis aims a big drive over the covers but misses. Was in the slot
skewed over backward point, a thick edge as Stoinis swings at a full delivery...200 for the Stars
how did he do that?! Extraordinary shot. A bottom-handed flick from outside off, just a little whip of wrists, and sends it over deep midwicket. Almost the helicopter?
finds deep midwicket! They won't go through none down. A low full toss at leg stump, he connected pretty well with his flick but didn't get quite enough
a dot ball as he moves across and misses a swing at a slower ball that goes over the stumps
a short ball which follows Stoinis as he swats it into midwicket
crunched! Short of a length, mid-off was inside the circle and that's where he went...carved over the off side
moves outside leg, a full delivery, straight down the ground, doesn't quite beat long-on and it's kept to a single
full toss on the pads, hooked over backward square leg...just escapes the no-ball, what a way to finish
worked off the pads into midwicket
how did that miss? Full at leg stump, fired into the pads and deflects just past leg stump
oh, that's a gem! Blimey, we've seen some shots tonight and nothing better than that. Moves to the leg side and drills through the line straight down the ground
gone this time! The pressure of a huge run chase. A short-of-a-length delivery, he aims to swipe into the leg side, goes high up and Gotch settles under it with the gloves on
good length outside off, drives on the up and has enough to reach the cover boundary
fuller, outside off, driven back down the pitch and Worrall dives across in his follow through
round the wicket, worked off the pads into square leg
fired in on a good length, driven back to Maxwell who hurls it back at the stumps and nearly takes out the keeper!
gives himself room outside leg, drives inside-out over cover...excellent shot
short of a length outside off, driven to cover
all the way, first over the innings! Dances down the pitch and strikes it beautifully over long-on
length ball at the stumps, pushed to the bowler
full at the pads, glances towards short fine leg
full outside off, plays a booming drive and misses
driven into the off side
back of a length at the stumps, Vince moves outside leg and drives to deep cover
short of a length, straight, a short-arm pull over midwicket
back of a length at middle and off, 141kph, pushed into the covers
dropped at deep square leg! A short ball, Vince pulls it very sweetly and it travels quickly to Hinchliffe and he can't hold on
full at off stump, 137kph, pushed towards mid-off
another short ball, angled down the leg side, there's a small appeal for a catch
full and straight, 140kph, driven straight but can't beat mid-off
very full, at the stumps, a slower ball at 119, they scamper a single to mid-on. Good backing up by Larkin
length ball angled in at leg stump, Vince swings to leg and gets a thick inside edge
straight down deep backward square! A length ball on middle and leg, in a decent swinging arc for Hughes but he can't place it and Worrall barely had to move in the deep
full outside off, 138kph, driven neatly to cover
short of a length, angled into the pads, pulled wide of short fine leg
length ball at off stump, a thick inside edge into the pads...not far from getting through
back of a length, straight, some extra bounce and it takes the splice to the off side
full and straight, 135kph, pushed into the off side
very full at the pads, deflects into the off side...decent over from Morris
gone with a direct hit! Short of a length, pulled one bounce to mid-on...Rauf couldn't hit
great shot! Made a terrific sound off the bat. Short of a length, straight, pulls it around the corner to deep backward square
outside off but still short, pulled in front of square this time
wider outside off, keeps it short, a slower ball and he's through his pull early
back of a length, straight, tucked off the pads to deep square
lovely timing! That's the best of Vince. Short of a length outside off, driven off the back foot through the covers
pulls across quite a full delivery, scoots under the bat through to the keeper
gets enough to clear mid-on, pulling off the front foot...could Worrall have got there? He seemed to slip
short outside off, cut very hard and finds the gap wide of third man
over adjusts, goes fuller and down the leg side
short of a length, straight, pulled off the body to deep square
dropped at mid-on...a sitter! Short of a length, Vince splices the pull, Worrall has all the time in the world at mid-on. That's a shocker. Good job the Stars have 219 runs to work with
full and straight, pushed back to the bowler
full outside off, driven to deep cover
stand and deliver! Strides forward and pops a full delivery straight down the ground. A skimming six
drags the length back, a touch flatter outside off, played to the off side
very full at leg stump, tucked into midwicket and they can't stop the second
drives to cover, the googly
short on leg stump, pulled to deep square leg
over the wicket, short outside off, no timing as he swats this into the leg side
a yorker, Vince can only dig it out
on the stumps, slog-swept to deep midwicket
a long hop, gets the wicket! Dragged down very short, Vince goes back and pulls but couldn't have picked out Maxwell any better
very full, driven along the ground to deep cover
a straight full toss, doesn't cost anything as he drives to cover. Good start from Hinchliffe
lovely bowling! Beats the outside edge with a hint of turn as he comes forward
short of a length outside off, back and across, whipped into midwicket
that sounded good! Gets down on the back knee and slog-sweeps over deep midwicket...might have broken 100 metres...comes in as 98!
flatter, quicker, on the stumps, worked into midwicket
pushed off the pads into the leg side
driven to cover, almost a mix-up in the running when they decide there isn't a single
wide outside off, a powerful drive to the cover sweeper
worked off the pads into midwicket
taken at long-off! Hinchliffe having a very good evening. Touch slower, a hint of turn, takes the outer part of the bat as he aims straight down the ground and skews to the fielder
driven into the covers
whips a low full toss to deep midwicket
short outside off, spins away, played out to the sweeper
round the wicket, swung into the leg side
short outside leg stump, does Silk for a lack of pace and he misses
on the pads, flicked in the air through square leg
chopped into the pitch and bobbles to the off side
dragged down short, no timing in the slog-pull from Silk that finds deep midwicket
gets a leading edge to the off side as he looks to work to leg
leans back, cuts and misses, goes over the top edge
done all ends up! Bowled much slower, dragged down a little shorter, Curran coming down the pitch and he's nowhere near the leg-break. Stumped by miles
full, wide outside off, driven to deep cover
short on the stumps, can only pulled to deep square
tucked off the pads into midwicket
full at off stump, he's caught on the back foot, manages to work it to square leg
full toss, worked off the pads to long-on
driven down the ground to long-off...Silk can't get going
short outside off, dies off the pitch and there's no timing into the leg side
short outside leg, pulled to the leg side
good catch by Rauf at short third man...wider outside off, a thick outside edge and Rauf does well to take it low down
full at the stumps, inside edge into the pads
full and straight, 140kph, driven sweetly but straight at cover
short and hammered, but the pull goes straight to deep midwicket
a full toss at the stumps, 142kph, squeezed out to deep point
worked off the pads into square leg
back of a length outside off, takes the bottom edge into the pitch
full at off stump, driven to cover...been one of those nights for Silk
short outside leg, pulled backward of square where Cartwright just manages to keep it in...and then there's the bullet arm
dragged into the leg side
down the pitch, struck this nicely, but it's a skimming drive to long-off
short outside off, square drives to deep cover
loses his shape as he heaves to the leg side, gets a bottom edge into the pads
short outside off, spins away further, can only get the toe end on it to cover...end of excellent spell
full outside off, slog-swept to deep midwicket
opens the face and angles this past backward point, he fielder should have done better
down on his back knee and sweeps to deep square
a big swing and a miss...they go upstairs to check the stumping. He gets the foot back over the line
pulled to deep midwicket
a googly, played off the back foot into the off side
completely does him with the slower ball! Short of a length, Silk is through his leg-side swipe before the ball arrives
gets an under edge on this hack, Gotch gets a glove on it as he dives
back of a length, heaved out to deep midwicket
short on leg stump, he goes for the hook and gets it away to fine leg...finally a boundary for Silk
a low full toss, driven down the ground
thump! Terrific shot...gives himself a touch of room to the leg side then drives through the line
good catch at deep midwicket...a full ball on off stump, heaved into the leg side, Cartwright made that look very easy, he's such a good fielder. First BBL wicket for Morris
full outside off, moves to the leg side and swings to deep midwicket
full outside off, a big drive which doesn't make contact
full outside off, a thick outside edge flies one bounce to third man
lofted down the ground, creeps over the long-on boundary...maybe he should have come in earlier?
back of a length outside off, misfield at mid-off as he flat-bats it
terrific yorker, he swings and gets an inside edge past leg stump
length ball at the stumps, crunched to deep midwicket
gives himself room to the leg side, swings hard at a short delivery, slices it over backward point
clears the boundary again! Rauf is full at off stump, in the slot, Dwarshuis heaves it over wide long-on
back of a length, pulls and finds the gap again, in front of square this time...some rare treatment for Rauf
fires down a very short bouncer...it's called wide. So the games goes on a ball longer
a slower short one, he swings and misses, through to the keeper
